articles.title: Eclipse-making double satellite Proba-3 enters orbit - European Space Agency
articles.description: A pair of spacecraft were launched together today from India with the potential to change the nature of future space missions. ESA’s twin Proba-3 platforms will perform precise formation flying down to a single millimetre, as if they were one single giant spa…
